headline: New Synchrony Study Finds Nearly 8 out of 10 Pet Owners Underestimate the Cost of Care, Reaching Up to $61,000 During a Pet's Lifetime
summary: Synchrony's (NYSE: SYF) new 2025 Pet Lifetime of Care Study reveals nearly 8 out of 10 pet owners underestimate the cost to care for their pet over a lifetime. The report highlights a growing trend of pet owners viewing their animals as part of the family and committing to high-quality care, even as nearly half report that unexpected expenses cause significant financial worry. Expanding on original research conducted in 2022, this new study surveyed nearly 5,000 U.S. dog and cat owners and, for

headline: Synchrony Financial: A Dip Is Needed For Valuation And Retracement To Synchronize
summary: Synchrony Financial remains profitable and resilient, supported by a strong capital buffer and prudent balance sheet management. See why SYF stock is a Hold.
